results.title: The Adventures of Skippy. - Volume 2.
results.creator_credit: Michael Midlam, Nine Network (Australia), Festival Records and Peter Andrikidis
results.brief_description: Skippy, the famous bush kangaroo, joins with her friends in the National Park for three exciting adventures. In “Skippy and the vandals”, Jerry is accused of vandalising the local school. With the help of Skippy, the vandals are soon caught. In “Skippy and the beach bullies”, Jerry, Lou and Skippy are enjoying the beach. However, two bullies are intent on spoiling their fun and getting Skippy into trouble with the Police. The final episode entitled “Skippy and the balloon” has a young Japanese tourist aloft in a balloon over the park because he doesn’t want to go home!

results.title: The Adventures of Priscilla, queen of the desert. (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Latent Image, Specific Films, Al Clark, Michael Hamlyn and Stephan Elliott
results.brief_description: This incredibly successful Australian comedy traces the adventures of three Sydney drag-queens who travel through the Australian outback in order to perform their exuberant act in Alice Springs. On their journey through the desert, on a bus christened Priscilla, they encounter both friendship and enmity from the small bush communities. Guy Pearce is excellent as the youngest drag-queen who has a tough mouth but a lot to learn about the world while Hugo Weaving is moving as a man who must reveal the truth of his homosexuality to his son. Terence Stamp is unforgettable as the transsexual Bernice and the loving relationship that develops between Stamp and Bill Hunter’s outback “bloke” is very tender and very touching. Full of humour, colour and bizarre costumes for which the film won an Academy Award, “Priscilla” is a wickedly entrancing family movie which shows that not only Australian cities but the mythical Australian bush has been affected and changed by ethnic and sexual multiculturalism. The soundtrack is full of great drag disco classics from “I Will Survive” and “Go West” to the more recent “Finally” and “Save the Best for Last.”

results.title: The Adventures of Prince Achmed = Die abenteur des Prinzen Achmed
results.brief_description: Often hailed as the first full-length animation film in the history of cinema, this is also pioneering animator Lotte Reiniger’s most extraordinary work. Reiniger developed a highly sophisticated silhouette animation technique inspired by Chinese shadow theatre. Intricate hand-cut silhouettes were combined with shimmering backgrounds created with wax and sand set on back lit glass. Colour-tinting further enhanced the luminous effect. Amongst her collaborators were her husband Carl Koch, who acted as her production manager and photographer, and the filmmakers Walter Ruttman (Berlin, Symphony of a City) and Berthold Bartosch (L’idee) who created backgrounds and special effects. The story from the Arabian Nights allows full rein for Reiniger’s elaborate and ingenious work - magical-flying horse, wicked sorcerer, djinns, ogres, monsters and wondrous kingdoms abound. This version has been restored with a new recording of the original orchestral score. Intertitles with English subtitles.

results.title: The Adventures of Milo and Otis (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Fuji Television Network, Columbia Pictures, Masaru Kakutani, Satoru Ogata and Masanori Hata
results.brief_description: Join a curious kitten named Milo and his inseparable buddy, a pug-nosed pup named Otis, as they fall, frolic, glide and tumble through one exciting escapade after another. Narrated by Dudley Moore. Based on an original story by Masanori Hata.

results.title: The Adventures of Milo and Otis
results.creator_credit: Masanori Hata, Satoru Ogata, Masaru Kakutani, Columbia Pictures and Fuji Television Network
results.brief_description: Join a curious kitten named Milo and his inseparable buddy, a pug-nosed pup named Otis, as they fall, frolic, glide and tumble through one exciting escapade after another. Raised together on a friendly, sunny farm, Milo and Otis love to explore the countryside and tease the barnyard animals. But one day mischievous little Milo lets curiosity get the better of him and he’s suddenly swept down a rushing river in a wooden box. Taking off to rescue his best friend, Otis also leaves the safety of the farm behind him forever. What starts as an amusing and funny game soon turns into the most breathtaking, heartwrenching adventure of their lives … where love and friendship are the most wonderful gifts of all. Based on an original story by Masanori Hata. Narrated by Dudley Moore.

results.title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley
results.brief_description: Mystery, action and songs abound as Detectives Mary-Kate and Ashley undertake a set of daring advetures. These trenchcoat twins and their dog Clue live by their agency motto to “solve any crime by dinner time.”

results.title: The Adventures of Buzz Boy & Buzz Girl
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This animated short depicts the adventures between an evil bee and super hero insects. Dr. Bee has hypnotised Buzz Boy to steal for him, after poisoning a peanut and jelly sandwich. Buzz Girl finds out the truth and informs Buzz Boy. Together they set out in search of Dr.Bee. They find him and are caught up in a high speed chase which eventuates in Dr.Bee crashing into the side of a skyscraper.

results.title: The Adventures of Blinky Bill: Mayor Blinky Bill
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross Films and Yoram Gross
results.brief_description: This animated tale features Blinky Bill and his friends. The episode, titled “Mayor Blinky Bill” sees Blinky Bill become Mayor. Being popular among the locals Blinky speaks up at a Council meeting where the loss of water from fire trucks is discussed. It seems that bumpy roads are the cause. Blinky takes on the job with enthusiasm until things become a little complicated. Blinky then finds himself facing annoying red tape and bureaucracy in trying to improve things. Blinky rethinks his position and reaches for the faithful fishing rod in exchange for the responsibility of the Mayor handing back the hat and all the difficulty that goes with it.

results.title: The Adventures of Blinky Bill
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description: Blinky Bill is one of the most loved characters in Australian children’s literature. He and his friends get up to many adventures in the bush in this popular animated series.
